text: Notommatidae is a family of rotifers in the order Ploima. == References == * O'Reilly, M. (2001). Rotifera, in: Costello, M.J. et al. (Ed.) (2001). European register of marine species: a check-list of the marine species in Europe and a bibliography of guides to their identification. Collection Patrimoines Naturels, 50: pages 149-151 == External links == * * Category:Eurotatoria Category:Platyzoa families Category:Taxa named by Philip Henry Gosse
title: Notommatidae
